title: Tirbute for Riot Support!
body:
Hello! I want to gift my bf cosmic blade master Yi and I was planning to purchase $5 rp because I have 695 but I realized I would be 5 RP short, so people told me to offer a tribute to Riot support and ask for help!
I'm adding the link to a Ahri I made, as I tribute, or if it has to be MS paint I'll do my best to draw another champ using that.
Thank you and I hope Riot sees this post and helps me with 5 RP!
Have a great time everyone!

replies.body: That's very sweet! I wish I could slip you 5 RP but sadly I can't xD I love the Ahri drawing, hope you receive your RP! (BTW, I never knew you could gift Riot something, is that new?)

I'll submit a ticket and see what happens, thanks!
And you can see if by drawing something or writing a poem, something they like, you can get a small amount of rp you need c:

Thank you! I will!
I hope it works!
